headline: Biden economic adviser heralds 'strong' recovery, blames Putin for much of energy-sector inflation

The U.S. economy "has a lot of strength" despite increasing inflationary pressures, while President Biden is promoting long-term energy security, White House National Economic Council Director Brian Deese told Fox News on Thursday.

The U.S. is producing more oil this year than we produced under the first year of the last president['s term]," Deese said, adding energy sector executives have pledged to increase production by 1 million barrels per day by fall.
